text: ` ` Most scripts we have a certain page count you want to stay around,'' executive producer Matthew B. Roberts tells THR. ` ` I didn't stick to a page count. Malcolm'' episode of Starz's Outlander. ] Following a prolongued wait, Starz's Outlander finally delivered its big print shop reunion between Jamie ( Sam Heughan ) and Claire ( Caitriona Balfe ) on Sunday, delivering the most iconic moment from Diana Gabaldon's series in grand fashion.
